net.javacoding.jspider.core
Interface Agent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AgentImpl
public interface Agent

Inteface of the JSpider agent, the instance to which all worker tasks will report and via which tasks can be obtained from the scheduler. $Id: Agent.java,v 1.5 2003/03/27 17:44:01 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey

          Registers that a certain taks is completed.

          Notifies the agent of a certain event.
 void scheduleForParsing(java.net.URL url)
          Asks to schedule parsing for a certain fetched URL.

          Asks to schedule spidering on a certain URL.

getThinkerTask

public WorkerTask getThinkerTask()
                          throws TaskAssignmentException
Returns a thinker task that must be executed

Returns:
the task to be carried out
Throws:
TaskAssignmentException - if there are no tasks (for now or anymore)

public WorkerTask getSpiderTask()
                         throws TaskAssignmentException
Returns a spider task that must be executed

Returns:
the task to be carried out
Throws:

registerEvent

public void registerEvent(java.net.URL url,
                          CoreEvent event)
Notifies the agent of a certain event.

Parameters:
url - the URL that was being processed while the event was raised
event - the event that was raised
